greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; a(n+1) = sum{k|n k<=sqrt(n)} a(k) where sum is over the positive divisors k of n with k <= sqrt(n).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
mathematica: a[1]=1; a[n_] := a[n] = Module[{d=Divisors[n-1], s=0, i=1}, While[i<=Length[d] && d[[i]]<=Sqrt[n-1], s=s+a[d[[i]]]; i++ ]; s]; Table[a[n], {n, 150}] (T. D. Noe)
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Mar 22 2002
ext: More terms from _T. D. Noe_, Nov 03 2004
